quests.name: Discover the Secrets of the Lost Oasis
quests.description: Embark on a journey to uncover the hidden wonders and mysteries of the 'Lost Oasis.' Explore the scorching desert, face 'Mirage Djinn' illusions, and confront the elusive 'Sand Serpents.'

quests.name: Tame the Sand Serpent
quests.description: Answer the call to tame the legendary 'Sand Serpent' that guards the 'Lost Oasis.' Solve riddles, navigate shifting sands, and earn the trust of this colossal guardian.

quests.name: Whispers in the Mirage
quests.description: Explore the mirage phenomenon that veils the 'Lost Oasis.' Seek out 'Illusion Wisps' and decipher the whispers of the desert winds to uncover hidden knowledge.

quests.name: Sands of Eternity
quests.description: Collect the rare 'Sands of Eternity,' a mystical substance that holds ancient memories. Navigate shifting dunes, evade quicksand traps, and contend with 'Sand Guardians.'

quests.name: Oasis Reclamation
quests.description: Undertake the monumental task of restoring the 'Lost Oasis' to its former glory. Battle against sandstorms and unearth the forgotten 'Aquifer Relics' to revive this desert paradise.
